column5: 4200 sf SUPERBOWL custom home! 4 bedroom, 4 full bathrooms. Upstairs game room. TV in Master, Living room, and Game Room. Office, kitchen, dining. 10 minuets from Kemah on the boardwalk. 20 min drive to Galveston Island. 30 min from Superbowl NRG Stadium. Visit Nasa, Kemah, Galveston, and Houston from this custom castle in a quiet League City neighborhood.
